nodes.text: The Congregate was a model of speeder bike produced by Prinawe during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The Prinawe Congregate was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan as a reward for those who attended the Community Cantina Tour in Anaheim in 2015. The first in a series of Cantina Tour rewards, the Congregate is shareable by players; they can give codes to other players so they can acquire the mount themselves.
